sections.subtitle: Who am I?
sections.summary: A proactive, creative and ambitious Junior Front End Developer who is fully committed to take on new opportunities to gain new skills within the development world. Capable of working in high pressure environments while maintaining an organized work schedule. Capable of programming in C#, HTML/CSS/JS. (Temporary, gonna expand on this)
